attributes.action: scrap car tax and add the cost to the price of petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Consecutive governments have spent millions of our tax money on chasing car tax dodgers.  This could be avoided by scrapping the current system and add an amount e.g. 10p to the price of petrol thereby negating the need to chase dodgers this would also mean that those who use the most fuel and thereby cause the most polution pay the most
